pack.tacz.emx_cust.name: §6CUST Gunsmith
emxcust.ammo.emx_cus_tool.name: §6“Super Gunsmith 2.0” Tool Box
emxcust.ammo.emx_cus_tool.tooltip:
§e【crafting materials/non-ammunition】
§7A civilian gunsmith's tool kit for weapon modification
is like a gun's wardrobe. Fully automatic,
armor-piercing high-explosive, and with a cool
appearance, the gunsmith can modify them all.
Of course, it might not be legal. Keep it low-key!
trisdyna.gun.tris_sf7e_wa.name: §6Ares SF7E “WhiteAres”
trisdyna.gun.tris_sf7e_wa.desc:
§6【Customs】§eSF7E-WhiteAres
§7Burst forth, swift as light.
§8§o“Ares-Ion”Original Color Scheme

trisdyna.fl3e_sd.desc:
§6【Customs】§eFL3E-24Christmas
§7It fires lasers, making
you a red-suited Santa.

emxarms.gun.emx_mk951r_ba.desc:

emxcust.emx_cust.desc:
§7Folk artisans' stage. They call it 'art,' like
live-streaming illegal gun mods and crafting
Draconic Reactors from Cardboard Boxes.
